description: Touphion is located on the east bank of the Nile River about 20 km south of Thebes. The ruins of a multi-period temple initially built by Sesostris I were found there.

history.comment: update summary, update place type to include temple; add idai gaz. link 2768136: el Tod by @nsouchon
create DARMC citation to preserve cross-project linkage after retracting DARMC location
add Arachne el Tod, (Ḏrty / Touphion) Al-Uqsur (Gouvernement), Ägypten, Afrika
add ToposText reference provided by bkiesling

Global migration and reindexing of citations and provenance, February 2012
Fixing modern/alt locations fumbled in intial import
